name: Dog In A Box
description:
Dog In A Box is a virtual reality dog building game, allowing the player to step into the shoes of a travelling toy dog maker. As you step into the shoes of the toy maker, you should expect to receive unexpected orders for toy dogs in often strange locations.

Things you can expect as a Dog Toy Maker
  • Fast paced dog making
  • Weird and wonderful dog orders
  • Four very different locations
  • Achievements to reward you for fantastic orders
  • A collection of all the dogs you have made in your career
  • Support for both HTC Vive and Oculus Rift
